label: Borovec, Roman & Rolf G. Oberprieler.  2013. Afrophloeus, a new genus of African weevils of the tribe Embrithini (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae), with description of a new species and notes on the composition of Embrithini. Zootaxa 3693(3): 365-378.
